Item.Value: [Name][Text:They'll be here any minute! Is everything ready?!]
[Name][Text:It's fine, it's fine. I'm prepared for this, right?]

[Name][Text:It's a pleasure to meet you. I hope the trip up here wasn't too hard. My name? OH! $Actor_20$. I'm $Actor_20$, and this is the Blue Hare Inn. I know it's not much, but it's not too shabby right? It was the first thing $Actor_16$ built when we got here, and I even tried to help a bit. I've been spending the past few days getting it ready for you and our other guests.]
[Name][Text:This will be one of the first places guests visit, so you should make sure to pop in and check to see if anyone likes it here enough to want to move in. Oh, and before I forget...]
[Name][Text:Travelers will be glad to get a nice meal while they're staying here. If you can keep me supplied, I can cook for them and earn some extra money as well.]
